message: Suddenly, my Coil rings.
Caller unknown?

name: 紅雀
message: "Who's it from?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Dunno."
When I answer, a video screen pops up unprompted.
But even more surprising is who's on it.

name: 紅雀
message: "Toue?!"

name: 東江
message: "Hello there, Aoba. Welcome. How are you feeling?"

name: 東江
message: "I must say, I'm impressed you made it this far."

name: 東江
message: "You should be proud of your friends. They put on quite the show."

name: 東江
message: "But now, I have a small favor to ask... I would like you to come the rest of the way alone."

name: 東江
message: "The others are a bit too unruly for my taste. Oh, you have nothing to fear. You're my guest."

name: 東江
message: "I'll even make you a promise. Come alone, and I'll cancel my broadcast to the Old Residential District."

name: 東江
message: "Step into the elevator next to you once you've made up your mind. I'm on the top floor. ...I'll be waiting."
The call ends and the elevator opens its doors.
For a few seconds, no one moves.

name: 紅雀
message: "...What do you want to do?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "...I have to go."

name: クリア
message: "It might be a trap!"

name: ノイズ
message: "Definitely a trap."

name: 蒼葉
message: "He promised to leave the Old Residential District alone."

name: 紅雀
message: "Can you really trust him?"

name: 蒼葉
message: "But if I don't cooperate, and something happens..."

name: 紅雀
message: "...Fine. Get going."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Koujaku..."

name: 紅雀
message: "You'll go no matter what I say. And I sure as hell don't trust Toue, but I do trust you."

name: 紅雀
message: "Just be sure to call when you're on your way down. We'll be making preparations."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Preparations?"

name: 紅雀
message: "Just a few surprises. All part of Mink's plan."

name: ミンク
message: "One way or another, it ends today."

name: クリア
message: "I believe in you, Master! So please come back safe!"

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah."
I nod to each of them in turn.

name: ベニ
message: "Hey, Ren! You better protect him, ya hear?! And come back! That's what good Allmates do!"

name: 蓮
message: "I know."

name: トリ
message: "Eh, you'll manage somehow. You're brighter than that sparrow, at least."

name: ベニ
message: "Hey, fuck you! Pretentious parrot motherfucker!"
Beni flaps his wings hard, cutting an irate loop through the air.

name: 紅雀
message: "Alright, Aoba. Stick out your hand. We'll send you off in style."
With an impish grin, Koujaku lays his hand atop mine.

name: 紅雀
message: "You guys, too! Hurry up!"

name: クリア
message: "Okay!"

name: ミンク
message: "...What?"

name: ノイズ
message: "This is stupid."
Noiz and Mink reluctantly join in.
We look at each other.

name: 紅雀
message: "See you soon, Aoba."
Koujaku gives me an encouraging smile. There's no doubt in his eyes that we'll see each other again.
So I answer in kind.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Yeah. You will."
